# Overview
SK data from Dieleman et al. 2020, [downloaded from the ORNL DAAC](https://doi.org/10.3334/ORNLDAAC/1787)
# Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(ids)
```

# Data

```{r}
field_sk = read.csv("../data/Field/SK/boreal_vegplots_c_combustion.csv")
```

```{r}
head(field_sk)
```

# To Points
%>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat"), # note the order!
           crs = 4326)
```{r}
points_sk = field_sk %>%
  dplyr::select(plot_id:fire_id) %>%
  st_as_sf(.,coords=c("longitude", "latitude"),crs=4326)
```

```{r}
plot(st_geometry(points_sk))
```

```{r}
names(points_sk)
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
sf::st_write(points_sk, "../outputs/FieldPoints/SKPoints/Sk2015.shp", driver="ESRI Shapefile")
```
